events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been categorized as Refund based on customer's request for money back due to incorrect item.
The support case has been assigned to agent Sarah M. for further assistance with the refund request.
Hello! I’m Sarah, and I’ll be assisting you today with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number?
To process your refund quickly, may I also ask if you have the incorrect item still in your possession?
Yes, I still have the wrong product here. The order number is ORD1234567. Please advise on the next steps.
Thank you for the info. We will arrange a return pickup at no cost to you and issue a full refund once the item is received.
That sounds good, thank you for your prompt help. I’ll wait for the pickup details then.
We confirm your refund has been processed fully after receiving the returned item. Please allow 3-5 business days for the amount to reflect in your account.
Checking in to ensure that the refund has appeared in your bank statement and that you are satisfied with the resolution.
As we have not received any further concerns, we are closing this case now. Thank you for contacting support.
